exp1.title: IT & CSV Consultant
exp1.subtitle: Efor
contenu: Deployment and configuration of servers, websites, and webapps via internal CMS
Server maintenance, version control with Git, and Python automation
Technical support, coordination, and monitoring of business teams
Monitoring, investigation, and incident resolution
Initiation, management, and follow-up of web-related projects
Tracking, management, and coordination of service requests and incidents from internal teams
Development of internal tools
<u>Tools & Environment</u>: Internal CMS, Python, Git

exp2.title: CSV, LIMS & IT Engineer Consultant
exp2.subtitle: wega Informatik AG
contenu: Experience with LIMS, CSV, QMS, URS, Scrum Master training, and regulatory compliance
Updated architecture diagrams for client software
Created a web tool 'Feedback Board' using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, and Azure
Participation in implementing solutions for website translation on WordPress
<u>CSV consulting</u>: contributed to the management of computerized systems, ensuring their ongoing compliance
<u>Tools</u>: Azure DevOps, Git, Node.js (Express), Docker, Microsoft Authentication, MySQL, WordPress

exp3.title: Bioinformatic analysis of CRISPR loci at the genus scale in Xanthomonas
exp3.subtitle: National Research and Development Institute (IRD)
contenu: Study of three species: Xanthomonas translucens, Xanthomonas albilineans, and Xanthomonas hortorum
Prediction of CRISPR loci, phylogenetic tree construction, and spacer comparison
Python and Bash scripts for process automation
<u>Tools</u>: CRISPRCasFinder, FastANI, MEGA11, BLAST, Galaxy

exp4.title: Genome analysis and comparison of bacteria isolated from the human microbiota
exp4.subtitle: National Institute for Agricultural Research (INRA)
contenu: Analysis of a comparative genomics study on 22 human bacterial strains (PacBio Sequel II)
Phylogenetic analysis and screening of virulence and antibiotic resistance genes
Python scripting and Conda environments
<u>Tools</u>: Prokka, Roary, OrthoANI, RGI, VFDB
